If you downloaded *THIS* torrent...

https://thepiratebay.org/torrent/5719719/Starcraft.2.Wings.of.Liberty-LiBERTY

IF YOU DIDN'T DOWNLOAD *THAT* torrent, then move on, there is nothing in *this* torrent for you.

Then you need to replace the .r27 file in *THAT* torrent, with the .r27 file in *THIS* torrent. *THEN* you can unpack it.

The unpacked file is larger then 4GB, so you need an NTFS file system, FAT32 won't let you unpack it.
